snippet.title: EreaDrone 2023 - Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to take flight with EreaDrone 2023, releasing soon!
More info: https://ereadrone.com
---

Get ready to enter the world of Drone Racing Esports with EreaDrone 2023! Experience the most realistic drone racing game ever made with the best virtual drone experience. EreaDrone has been developed by pilots for pilots and players alike. You don't need to be an experienced real FPV drone pilot to play, race and freestyle with your friends all around the world.

With the ability to create multiplayer lobbies and fly up to 8 pilots simultaneously, EreaDrone is the perfect way to test your skills against other pilots. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced real FPV drone pilot, EreaDrone's realistic physics will make you feel like you're flying a real drone.

Use the map editor to create tracks and maps of all kinds, for freestyle and racing! Share your creations easily with other players with just one click. Fly in various environments like a meadow, carpark, suburb, construction site, stadium, school, mountains, or whatever you can imagine!

Get ready to take the drone racing world by storm with EreaDrone 2023, the future of Esports!

Find out more info on: https://ereadrone.com/play
